content.rendered:
An infusion of nine powerful botanical oils including centella, carrot oil, palmerosa and frankincense. Skin firming actives plus nourishing fatty acids and anti-oxidants stimulate cellular turnover, boost elasticity, strengthen capillaries, diminish wrinkles, and protect against free radicals.

The unique formula penetrates deeply, restoring moisture, clarity and glow to your skin. The texture is gorgeous and the aroma is subtle and beautiful.

excerpt.rendered: This nourishing, potent blend of botanical oils sinks in instantly to deliver supple, radiant skin and improved clarity.
